title: 'Peacocks' are redefining older men's fashion, study shows (Nottingham Trent University)
text: ( Source : Nottingham Trent University ) Wednesday 30 September 2015 'Peacocks' are redefining older men's fashion, study shows A researcher who undertook a first of its kind study into older men's experiences of fashion says an emerging trend
